# FST CAN Protocol
JSON specification for can bus messages and helper tools.

## Install

	$ pip install fcp

## Usage

	$ fcp
	Usage: fcp [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

	Options:
	  --help  Show this message and exit.

	Commands:
	  c-gen
	  gui
	  init
	  read_dbc
	  validate
